name: THE WORLD IS HOSTILE // prototype
description:
THE WORLD IS HOSTILE is a FIGHTING GAME PROTOTYPE
made available exclusively for exhibition & good times purposes

2 characters, 4 buttons, no budget
fight a friend locally, or fight a very bad AI
but please, be kind to the AI,
it's their first day on the job

might be updated with more stuff,
but it's very low on the priority list
because these animations are hard yall

supports xinput controllers
and has limited legacy joystick support

---------------------------------------------
DEFAULT P1 KEYBOARD CONTROLS
Arrow Keys // Move, Menu
Z // Attack A, Confirm
X // Attack B, Cancel
C // Super Attack, Change Color
Space // Dash, Change Color
Enter // Start, Pause
[0] // Keybind Menu
---------------------------------------------

Music from BEAT THE ART BREAKER OST

this fight will never be finished
